Isn't It Romantic

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt2452244

Classificação: 5.9

Sinopse: A fat single female architect has problems finding a man. She hates romcoms with unrealistic happy endings. At her NYC office she's treated disrespectful by all but her two friends. She instantly falls for the new handsome customer. She hits her head during a mugging and wakes up as the main character in a romcom where men find her cute. The handsome customer falls for her.—Scott Filtenborg
